S.FORM: Darrel Brown sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas te 1923, byacing te 3 ru 14 ryax qu hintgan nya, kinhulan nya ga California, hiya ga mnanak na ppzuy mari waya, ru squliq ka ppkal mari waya. 188 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 79 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. kawas 1948 mnwayaw ppzuy mari ga, mzyup squ te qutux lahuy ru te magal squliq, galun nqu Baltimore Bullets. pincyogan na qnxan 2003 kawas, Darrel Brown maki na 100 pspung wal magal te sazing, Kim Collins wal magal te qutux. maki pspung wal magal cinbwanan slaquh psapung. 2003 kawas maki Pan American Games wal magal te sazing . Central American ru Caribbean Caribbean wal magal te qutux. 2005 kawas 6 byacing, Brown wal magal blaq balay sqabu. 2005 kawas maki , Brown 10.16 mhtaw pspung la.suruw lga,maki pspung wal nya slaquh kwara qalang 38.10 , Trinidad ru Tobago wal magal te sazing. suruw lga maki 2005 kawas cinbwanan pspung,Brown wal magal te payat. maki 2009 kawas Berlin , Brown sangka Trinidad ru Tobago 4x100 pspung, suruw ( Tobago) ga kwara qalang wal nya slaquh 37.62 magal te sazing. Brown ga T.T.O. te qutux , Jamaica's trang wal magal te qutux 37.31 . pincyuwagan nya'
